summary.description: short list of main calculated or meassured properties and production method. This is like a keyword entry
summary.value: AGA, crystal, energy, magnetization, anisotropy, exchange, Tc, domain wall width, exchange stiffness

chemical formula.description: composition description of the compound in the calculated or measured unit cell

production info.description: information about how the material was made or theoretically obtained/predicted
production info.value: obtained by Adaptive Genetic Algorithm,  software USPEX+VASP

compound space group.description: number identifying the space group in 3d

lattice parameters.description: lattice parameters of the unit cell (a,b,c)

atomic positions.description: atomic positions in the unit cell

crystal info.description: information about how the crystal structure was calculated or measured
crystal info.value: software VASP, k-points mesh 16x16x11, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000,Pressure=0.0 kbar,temperature=0K

unit cell energy.description: total ab initio energy of the unit cell

energy info.value: software VASP, k-points mesh 16x16x11, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Pressure=0.0 kbar,temperature=0K

interatomic potentials info.description: information about how the interatomic potentials were developed

magnetic free energy.description: magnetic free energy in units of eV

magnetic free energy info.description: information about how the magnetic free energy was calculated
magnetic free energy info.value: software VASP, k-points mesh 16x16x11, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Pressure=0.0 kbar, temperature=0K

unit cell spin polarization.description: the total spin polarization of the cell

atomic spin specie.description: magnetization per atom of each specie

saturation magnetization.description: unit cell spin polarization/unit cell volume

magnetization temperature.description: temperature at which the magnetization is calculated or measured

magnetization info.description: information about how the magnetization was calculated or measured
magnetization info.value: software VASP, k-points mesh 16x16x11, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Pressure=0.0 kbar

magnetocrystalline anisotropy energy.description: energy of unit cell when magnetization is constraint in some particular directions. Format=(mx,my,mz), energy magnitude

anisotropy energy type.description: uniaxial or cubic anisotropy energy type

kind of anisotropy.description: depending on the value of the magnetocrystalline constants there are different kind of anisotropy

anisotropy info.description: information about how the magnetocrystalline anisotropy was calculated or measured
anisotropy info.value: software VASP, including spin-orbit coupling, 2816 k-points in IBZ, Ecut-off=400 eV, PAW_PBE, Fe_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Ni_pv:PAW_PBE:06Sep2000, Pressure=0.0 kbar

exchange integrals.description: exchange integrals, sorted by interatomic distance

exchange info.description: information about how exchange integrals were calculated
exchange info.value: software Fleur, spin spirals (Fourier transform), kmax=4.1 a.u., 1960 k-points and 463 q-points, PBE, Pressure=0.0 kbar

curie temperature.description: the Curie temperature in units of Kelvin

curie temperature info.description: information about how Curie temperature was calculated or measured
curie temperature info.value: software UppASD, Atomistic Spin Dynamics, system size 40x40x40 spins, periodic boundary conditions

hysteresis info.description: information about how hysterisis properties (anisotropy field, remanence, coercivity and energy product) were calculated or measured

domain wall info.description: information about how domain wall width was calculated or measured
domain wall info.value: Atomistic Spin Dynamics, system size 300x40x40 spins, temperature=5K

exchange stiffness info.description: information about how exchange stiffness was calculated or measured
exchange stiffness info.value: It was calculated using well-known formula where A is the exchange stiffness

authors.description: names or/and institutions which are the authors of these data

reference.description: publications or links where these data can be found

comments.description: additional information about these data, which was not mentioned above

attached files.description: Crystallographic data (metadata format CIF, CONTCAR.vasp, ...), property values versus temperature, property values versus external magnetic field, interatomic potentials, figures, ...

attached files info.description: short description of the attached files
